title: nAnEnu mADidenO
sahitya:
nAnEnu mADidenO krSNayya nInenna salahabEku


caraNam 1    karirAja karesidane draupadi dEvi paredole kaLuhidaLe haruSadindali rSipatniya shApava pariharisideyallO hE svAmi
    caraNam 2    rakkasa tanujanalle prahlAda cikka prAyada dhruvanu sikkida pApa mADida ajAmiLa ninnakkare magane pELo hE svAmi
    caraNam 3    oppiDi avalakkiya krSNayya ninagoppisidavagolideoppEnu ninage shrI purandara viTTalavarappande kAya bEkO hE svAmi
